meanings.sent1: The echocardiographers at the hospital use ultrasound to check hearts.
meanings.sent2: The team of echocardiographers is highly skilled in heart imaging.
meanings.sent3: The echocardiographers had a heart-to-heart about their favorite heart images.
meanings.sent4: The echocardiographers are like heart detectives, uncovering mysteries within.
meanings.sent5: The echocardiographers' work reveals the hidden secrets of the heart.
